name: Dodger (PowerhouseLabs)
description:
Clarence the Crab had a peaceful life on his own private paradise. That is, until golden coins started appearing and pirates came to collect!

Dodge out of the way and grab as many coins as you can without getting hit by a cannonball. Up the ante as you earn points, with cannonballs flying faster and being fired at your island more often!

Controls

WASD will move you around, according to the diagram in the game

Credits

Landscape Assets: Kenney.nl

SFX: SubspaceAudio

Crab Player Model: rokerflower

Pirate Coin Model: acasas

BGM: “Skate” by Komiku

WASD Key Images: Gerald Burke
